name: [WIP] Unnamed Mecha Game
description:
Short mecha game made in 4 days during a school workshop. I mainly focused on gameplay features, so level design and art are the bare minimum.

Known Bugs :  

  • Player not respawning when entering / leaving mech  (close the game if that happens, sorry)
  • Drones sometimes going the opposite direction when triggered 
  • Turrets cannon sometimes disappearing when shooting
  • Controller not working in menus

CONTROLS

Use of a controller over mouse/keyboard recommended

-----------------------MECH CONTROLS---------------------------

Left Stick / ZQSD / Directional Arrows ------- Move

Right Stick / Mouse Movement ------------------ Look Around

Left Trigger / Left Mouse Button -------------- Shoot Left Gun

Right Trigger / Right Mouse Button ------------ Shoot Right Gun

right Shoulder Button / E --------------------- Shoot Railguns

Bottom Face Button / Space -------------------- Jump

Right Face Button / Shift --------------------- Use Boost

Left Face Button / R -------------------------- Reload

Top Face Button / F --------------------------- Exit Mech

----------------------PILOT CONTROLS---------------------------

Left Stick / ZQSD / Directional Arrows ------- Move

Right Stick / Mouse Movement ------------------ Look Around

Right Trigger / Left Mouse Button ------------ Shoot Gun

Bottom Face Button / Space -------------------- Jump

Left Face Button / R -------------------------- Reload

Top Face Button / F --------------------------- Enter Mech

GOALS

Progress through the levels to reach the end of the game. Destroy the Turret and Drones along the way.
